page.title: 10Services and Amenities
page.content:
The small population of this area does not warrant any amenities in the area apart from the long established parish churches.{ {Education}- children go to Etwall. There are no{clubs or groups}-people go to nearby Etwall, Dalbury Lees or Derby. { {Inns}are at Etwall and Dalbury Lees. { {Postal}collection is once a day. A{travelling shop}from Hatton tours the area on Tuesdays. There is no{public transport.
There is a daily delivery of {newspapers}to roadside gates- the papers are stuffed into short pipes placed there for this purpose.
